content: --- title: River X description: Product Documentation For River X published: true date: 2023-03-29T08:08:41.265Z tags: product, river-x editor: markdown dateCreated: 2022-11-02T14:30:57.768Z --- # River X Documentation River X (River Next Generation) is an iPaaS (Integration Platform as a Service) solution built for transportation industry especially airlines and railways. Â  As airlines need the speed, agility and economics of cloud, there is an incentive for single, unified integration platform, with configurable governance, reusability of integration assets, extensibility and the ability to quickly adapt with everchanging, growing business needs. iPaaS (IntegrationPlatform as a Service) is a cloud-native solution for data, business processes and partner integration scenarios in terms of event-driven architecture. It is a competitive solution for cloud-to-cloud, cloud-to-on- premises or on-premises-to-on-premises environments while supporting real-time, API, ETL integrations. iPaaS platform provides customers with the benefits listed below: - Speed of development and faster time to market - Implementation cost benefits - Scalability This documention presents the Avsos' solution for ipaas : River-X. The goal is to provide a common understanding of the solution and its inner dynamics. ## Contents [FAQ](/river-x/faq) [How to](/river-x/howto) [Data Models](/river-x/data-models) [Events](/river-x/events) [Services](/river-x/services) [Source Mappings](/river-x/source-mapping)
